Name: BULBASAUR
Bio: A STRANGE SEED WAS PLANTED ON ITS BACK AT BIRTH. THE PLANT SPROUTS AND GROWS WITH THIS POKEMON.

Name: IVYSAUR
Bio: WHEN THE BULB ON ITS BACK GROWS LARGE, IT APPEARS TO LOSE THE ABILITY TO STAND ON ITS HIND LEGS.

Name: VENUSAUR
Bio: THE PLANT BLOOMS WHEN IT IS ABSORBING SOLAR ENERGY. IT STAYS ON THE MOVE TO SEEK SUNLIGHT.

Name: CHARMANDER
Bio: OBVIOUSLY PREFERS HOT PLACES. WHEN IT RAINS, STEAM IS SAID TO SPOUT FROM THE TIP OF ITS TAIL.

Name: CHARMELEON
Bio: WHEN IT SWINGS ITS BURNING TAIL, IT ELEVATES THE TEMPERATURE TO UNBEARABLY HIGH LEVELS.

Name: CHARIZARD
Bio: SPITS FIRE THAT IS HOT ENOUGH TO MELT BOULDERS. KNOWN TO CAUSE FOREST FIRES UNINTENTIONALLY.

Name: SQUIRTLE
Bio: AFTER BIRTH, ITS BACK SWELLS AND HARDENS INTO A SHELL. POWERFULLY SPRAYS FOAM FROM ITS MOUTH.

Name: WARTORTLE
Bio: OFTEN HIDES IN WATER TO STALK UNWARY PREY. FOR SWIMMING FAST, IT MOVES ITS EARS TO MAINTAIN BALANCE.

Name: BLASTOISE
Bio: A BRUTAL POKEMON WITH PRESSURIZED WATER JETS ON ITS SHELL. THEY ARE USED FOR HIGH SPEED TACKLES.

Name: CATERPIE
Bio: ITS SHORT FEET ARE TIPPED WITH SUCTION PADS THAT ENABLE IT TO TIRELESSLY CLIMB SLOPES AND WALLS.

Name: METAPOD
Bio: THIS POKEMON IS VULNERABLE TO ATTACK WHILE ITS SHELL IS SOFT, EXPOSING ITS WEAK AND TENDER BODY.
Comments: Bio: 'POKéMON' → 'POKEMON'. Strength: lower than unevolved form.

Name: BUTTERFREE
Bio: IN BATTLE, IT FLAPS ITS WINGS AT HIGH SPEED TO RELEASE HIGHLY TOXIC DUST INTO THE AIR.

Name: WEEDLE
Bio: OFTEN FOUND IN FORESTS, EATING LEAVES. IT HAS A SHARP VENOMOUS STINGER ON ITS HEAD.

Name: KAKUNA
Bio: ALMOST INCAPABLE OF MOVING, THIS POKEMON CAN ONLY HARDEN ITS SHELL TO PROTECT ITSELF FROM PREDATORS.

Name: BEEDRILL
Bio: FLIES AT HIGH SPEED AND ATTACKS USING ITS LARGE VENOMOUS STINGERS ON ITS FORELEGS AND TAIL.

Name: PIDGEY
Bio: A COMMON SIGHT IN FORESTS AND WOODS. IT FLAPS ITS WINGS AT GROUND LEVEL TO KICK UP BLINDING SAND.

Name: PIDGEOTTO
Bio: VERY PROTECTIVE OF ITS SPRAWLING TERRITORIAL AREA, THIS POKEMON WILL FIERCELY PECK AT ANY INTRUDER.
Comments: Bio: 'POKéMON' → 'POKEMON'. Strength: lower than unevolved form.

Name: PIDGEOT
Bio: WHEN HUNTING, IT SKIMS THE SURFACE OF WATER AT HIGH SPEED TO PICK OFF UNWARY PREY SUCH AS MAGIKARP.

Name: RATTATA
Bio: BITES ANYTHING WHEN IT ATTACKS. SMALL AND VERY QUICK, IT IS A COMMON SIGHT IN MANY PLACES.

Name: RATICATE
Bio: IT USES ITS WHISKERS TO MAINTAIN ITS BALANCE. IT APPARENTLY SLOWS DOWN IF THEY ARE CUT OFF.

Name: SPEAROW
Bio: EATS BUGS IN GRASSY AREAS. SPEAROW HAS TO FLAP ITS SHORT WINGS AT HIGH SPEED TO STAY AIRBORNE.

Name: FEAROW
Bio: WITH ITS HUGE AND MAGNIFICENT WINGS IT CAN KEEP ALOFT WITHOUT EVER HAVING TO LAND FOR REST.

Name: EKANS
Bio: MOVES SILENTLY AND STEALTHILY. EATS THE EGGS OF BIRDS SUCH AS PIDGEY AND SPEAROW WHOLE.
Comments: Bio: 'birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.' → No commas.

Name: ARBOK
Bio: IT IS RUMORED THAT THE FEROCIOUS WARNING MARKINGS ON ITS BELLY DIFFER FROM AREA TO AREA.

Name: PIKACHU
Bio: WHEN SEVERAL OF THESE POKÉMON GATHER, THEIR ELECTRICITY COULD BUILD AND CAUSE LIGHTNING STORMS.

Name: RAICHU
Bio: ITS LONG TAIL SERVES AS A GROUND TO PROTECT ITSELF FROM ITS OWN HIGH VOLTAGE POWER.

Name: SANDSHREW
Bio: BURROWS DEEP UNDERGROUND IN ARID LOCATIONS FAR FROM WATER. IT ONLY EMERGES TO HUNT FOR FOOD.

Name: SANDSLASH
Bio: CURLS UP INTO A SPINY BALL WHEN THREATENED. IT CAN ROLL WHILE CURLED UP TO ATTACK OR ESCAPE.

Name: NIDORANS
Bio: ALTHOUGH SMALL, ITS VENOMOUS BARBS RENDER THIS POKEMON DANGEROUS. THE FEMALE HAS SMALLER HORNS.
Comments: Name: 'Nidoran♀' → 'NIDORANS'. Bio: 'POKéMON' → 'POKEMON'. Strength: higher than evolved form.

Name: NIDORINA
Bio: THE FEMALES HORN DEVELOPS SLOWLY. PREFERS PHYSICAL ATTACKS SUCH AS CLAWING AND BITING.
Comments: Bio: 'female's' → 'FEMALES'. Strength: lower than unevolved form.

Name: NIDOQUEEN
Bio: ITS HARD SCALES PROVIDE STRONG PROTECTION. IT USES ITS HEFTY BULK TO EXECUTE POWERFUL MOVES.

Name: NIDORAN..
Bio: STIFFENS ITS EARS TO SENSE DANGER. THE LARGER ITS HORNS, THE MORE POWERFUL ITS SECRETED VENOM.

Name: NIDORINO
Bio: AN AGGRESSIVE POKEMON THAT IS QUICK TO ATTACK. THE HORN ON ITS HEAD SECRETES A POWERFUL VENOM.

Name: NIDOKING
Bio: IT USES ITS POWERFUL TAIL IN BATTLE TO SMASH, CONSTRICT, THEN BREAK THE PREYS BONES.

Name: CLEFAIRY
Bio: ITS MAGICAL AND CUTE APPEAL HAS MANY ADMIRERS. IT IS RARE AND FOUND ONLY IN CERTAIN AREAS.

Name: CLEFABLE
Bio: A TIMID FAIRY POKEMON THAT IS RARELY SEEN. IT WILL RUN AND HIDE THE MOMENT IT SENSES PEOPLE.

Name: VULPIX
Bio: AT THE TIME OF BIRTH, IT HAS JUST ONE TAIL. THE TAIL SPLITS FROM ITS TIP AS IT GROWS OLDER.

Name: NINETALES
Bio: VERY SMART AND VERY VENGEFUL. GRABBING ONE OF ITS MANY TAILS COULD RESULT IN A 1,000-YEAR CURSE.

Name: JIGGLYPUFF
Bio: WHEN ITS HUGE EYES LIGHT UP, IT SINGS A MYSTERIOUSLY SOOTHING MELODY THAT LULLS ITS ENEMIES TO SLEEP.

Name: WIGGLYTUFF
Bio: THE BODY IS SOFT AND RUBBERY. WHEN ANGERED, IT WILL SUCK IN AIR AND INFLATE ITSELF TO AN ENORMOUS SIZE.

Name: ZUBAT
Bio: FORMS COLONIES IN PERPETUALLY DARK PLACES. USES ULTRASONIC WAVES TO IDENTIFY AND APPROACH TARGETS.

Name: GOLBAT
Bio: ONCE IT STRIKES, IT WILL NOT STOP DRAINING ENERGY FROM THE VICTIM EVEN IF IT GETS TOO HEAVY TO FLY.

Name: ODDISH
Bio: DURING THE DAY, IT KEEPS ITS FACE BURIED IN THE GROUND. AT NIGHT, IT WANDERS AROUND SOWING ITS SEEDS.

Name: GLOOM
Bio: THE FLUID THAT OOZES FROM ITS MOUTH ISN'T DROOL. IT IS A NECTAR THAT IS USED TO ATTRACT PREY.

Name: VILEPLUME
Bio: THE LARGER ITS PETALS, THE MORE TOXIC POLLEN IT CONTAINS. ITS BIG HEAD IS HEAVY AND HARD TO HOLD UP.

Name: PARAS
Bio: BURROWS TO SUCK TREE ROOTS. THE MUSHROOMS ON ITS BACK GROW BY DRAW-ING NUTRIENTS FROM THE BUG HOST.
Comments: Bio: 'DRAW-ING' directly copies R/B hyphenation (due to line break).

Name: PARASECT
Bio: A HOST-PARASITE PAIR IN WHICH THE PARASITE MUSHROOM HAS TAKEN OVER THE HOST BUG. PREFERS DAMP PLACES.

Name: VENONAT
Bio: LIVES IN THE SHADOWS OF TALL TREES WHERE IT EATS INSECTS. IT IS ATTRACTED BY LIGHT AT NIGHT.

Name: VENOMOTH
Bio: THE DUST-LIKE SCALES COVERING ITS WINGS ARE COLOR CODED TO INDICATE THE KINDS OF POISON IT HAS.

Name: DIGLETT
Bio: LIVES ABOUT ONE YARD UNDERGROUND WHERE IT FEEDS ON PLANT ROOTS. IT SOMETIMES APPEARS ABOVE GROUND.

Name: DUGTRIO
Bio: A TEAM OF DIGLETT TRIPLETS. IT TRIGGERS HUGE EARTHQUAKES BY BURROWING 60 MILES UNDERGROUND.

Name: MEOWTH
Bio: ADORES CIRCULAR OBJECTS. WANDERS THE STREETS ON A NIGHTLY BASIS TO LOOK FOR DROPPED LOOSE CHANGE.
Comments: Type: Trunctated 'CA(T)'. Strength: higher than evolved form.

Name: PERSIAN
Bio: ALTHOUGH ITS FUR HAS MANY ADMIRERS, IT IS TOUGH TO RAISE AS A PET BECAUSE OF ITS FICKLE MEANNESS.

Name: PSYDUCK
Bio: WHILE LULLING ITS ENEMIES WITH ITS VACANT LOOK, THIS WILY POKEMON WILL USE PSYCHOKINETIC POWERS.

Name: GOLDUCK
Bio: OFTEN SEEN SWIMMING ELEGANTLY BY LAKE SHORES. IT IS OFTEN MISTAKEN FOR THE JAPANESE MONSTER, KAPPA.
